players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob's death is suspicious, and I think Diana should be investigated."
Diana: "I will remain silent for now"
You: "I think we should investigate Charlie, he seemed suspicious when Bob was found dead."
Diana: "I will not say anything, but I'm keeping an eye on Charlie. He might have a reason to want Bob dead."
Charlie: "I think we should investigate Diana, she was acting suspiciously last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
